name: Antique Collector
originalText:
Antique Collector can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
When Antique Collector enters the battlefield, creatures you control perpetually gain "When this creature dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library if it's in your graveyard. If you do, investigate." (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
